title:
The weak Lefschetz properties of artinian monomial algebras associated
  to certain tadpole graphs
authors: Phan Minh Hung, Nguyen Duy Phuoc, Tran Nguyen Thanh Son
abstract:
Given a simple graph $G$, the artinian monomial algebra associated to $G$,
denoted by $A(G)$, is defined by the edge ideal of $G$ and the squares of the
variables. In this article, we classify some tadpole graphs $G$ for which
$A(G)$ has or fails the weak Lefschetz property.
